summary.name: Cineworld Group plc.
summary.description: Cineworld Group plc. was established in 1995 in Europe as a private company but came public in May 2006. Cineworld is a parent company to multiple international cinemas. The parent company owns a total of 767 theatres, (9,311 screens) in 10 countries. After their acquisition of Regal Entertainment Group in Dec, 2017, the company became the second to third largest exhibitor of film. Their films span across Europe, North America, and Israel. In additon the company has acquired Cinema City International NP. The cinimas are played in a combination of Regalm, Cineworld, Cinema City, Yes Planet, and Picture House. The company is ran by CEO Mooky Greidinger.

overview.name: Cineworld Group plc. Headquarters & Cineworld Cinemas UK Head Office
overview.description: This location runs the administrative operations behind decisions and actions taken by Cineworld Cinemas UK. In adddition this is the main head quarters of the parent company. This means this site runs customer service contact (between (9:00 am and 5:30 pm GMT Mon-Fri), manage investor contacts and relations, and manage shareholder enquiries).

location.address: 8th floor, Vantage London, Great West Road, Brentford, TW8 9AG, United Kingdom

overview.name: Regal Entertainment Group Head Office
overview.description: This location runs the administrative operations behind decisions and actions taken by Regal Cinemas. Their influence covers many of their theatres throughout the United States of America. There is a customer service operational site on behalf of Regal located here. There are a total of 20 employees working in this location.The manager who runs this site is Mr. Rich Givens, Vice President of Business Development.

overview.name: Cinema City International Head Office
overview.description: This location is highly "head office" in name mostly. According to a variety of sources the main administrative operations behind decisions, actions, and property deals are dealt with in offices in Israel, Poland, and Bulgaria.

overview.name: Cinema City International Poland Head Office
overview.description: This location runs the administrative operations behind decisions and actions taken by Cinema City International. Their influence covers many of their theatre property decisions throughout Poland.

overview.name: Cinema City International Bulgaria Head Office
overview.description: This location runs the administrative operations behind decisions and actions taken by Cinema City International. Their influence covers many of their theatre property decisions throughout Bulgaria.

overview.name: Cinema City International Romania Head Office
overview.description: This location runs the administrative operations behind decisions and actions taken by Cinema City International. Their influence covers many of their theatre property decisions throughout Romania.

location.address: Str. Dr. Alexandru Boicescu nr. 10A, Sector 5, Bucharest, Romania

overview.name: Cinema City International & Yes Planet Israel Head Office
overview.description: This location runs the administrative operations behind decisions and actions taken by Yes Planet under Cinema City International under Cineworld Group plc.

location.address: 91 Medinat HaYehudim Street, Herzliya Pituach, Israel

overview.name: Picturehouse Cinemas ltd. Head Office
overview.description: This location runs the administrative operations behind decisions and actions taken by Picturehouse Cinemas ltd. Their influence covers 26 cinemas in the UK.

location.address: 7th Floor, St Vincent House, 30 Orange Street London WC2H 7HH, UK

overview.name: Regal Cinemas 42nd St. New York Theatre Location
overview.description: This is my local Cinema theatre. This theatre has multiple screening rooms featuring IMAX, 4Dx, RPX, and Screen X. This theatre, along with all others theatres in New York, are currently in the reopening process. From a technical view, this location displays films both independent and major blockbuster. Additionally this place sells concessions (food and drink) for customers enjoyment.

overview.name: Cineworld Dublin Location
overview.description: This is the biggest movie theatre in Ireland boasting 17 cinemas and 4 floors displaying regular regular film experience and IMAX. It displays both European and American Films. This theatre has been in control of Cineworld since 2004.

location.address: Parnell Center, Parnell Street, Dublin Street, Dublin, Ireland

overview.name: Cineworld Glosgow Location
overview.description: This is the tallest movie theatre in the world. It has 18 cinemas over 6 floors displaying refular film experiece and IMAX. It displays both European and American Films. It displays a neat crisscrossing elevators

overview.name: Cinema City Poland Location
overview.description: This is the largest theatre in Poland, featuring 20 screens (3,060 seats) over IMAX, 4DX, and regular screen experience.

overview.name: Cinema City Czech Republic Location
overview.description: This is the largest theatre in Czech Republic, featuring 18 screens including 1 4DX, and regular screen experience. This theatre opened October of 2017. It displays both European and American Films.

overview.name: Cinema City Slovakia Location
overview.description: This is the oldest cinema city theatre in Slovakia in the Polis City Center opening in 2000. It features 8 screens. It displays both European and American Films.

overview.name: Cinema City Hungary Location
overview.description: This is the largest theatre in Hungary, featuring 10 screens. This theatre opened October of 1999. It displays both European and American Films.

overview.name: Cinema City Bulgaria Location
overview.description: This is the largest theatre in Bulgaria, featuring 13 screens including IMAX. This theatre is located in the "mall of sofia" in Bulgaria. It displays both European and American Films.

location.address: MALL SOFIA - 101 AL. STAMBOLIJSKI BOULEVARD, SOFIA, SG, BULGARIA, 1330

overview.name: Yes Planet Israel Location
overview.description: This Yes Planet location is the largest cinema theatre in Israel under Yes Planet, featuring 26 screens, including 4 VIP screens, IMAX, 4DX, ScreenX, and two banquet halls. It displays, European, American, and Israeli films.

location.address: HaMea VeEsrim St 4, Rishon LeTsiyon, Israel

overview.name: Cinema City Romania Location
overview.description: Cinema City Cotroceni. This is the largest theatre in Romania, featuring 21 screen including 4 VIP screens and an IMAX studio. This theatre opened in Oct, 2009. It displays both European and American Films.
